    1Abstract class that other different kinds of event will extend.
    EventOverlapException
    Exception to be thrown if event getting added to a Day is overlapping with another event happening at the same time.
    Homework
    Class for the Homework object.
    Hour
    Hour class that has an integer called time which represents the time of day from 0 to 24 and a minute modifier that represents the minute of that hour
    InvalidEventTimeException
    An exception that will be thrown when the event time of a reminder is invalis
    LimitedTreeSet
    A LimitedTreeSet data structure.
    Month
    Month class that contains Day objects in a limited tree set.
    MonthNotFoundException
    Month not found exception that will be called when a year des not have a specified month.
    negativeReminderOffsetException
    Exception that will be thrown when the offset attribute of an instance of the Reminder class is negative.
    Year
